definition: Yuan'an county in Yichang 宜昌[Yi2 chang1], Hubei
far/distant/remote/(intensifier in a comparison) by far/much (lower etc)
content/calm/still/quiet/safe/secure/in good health/to find a place for/to install/to fix/to fit/to bring (a charge against sb)/to pacify/to harbor (good intentions)/security/safety/peace/ampere

sentences.english: Luyuan tea, a kind of historic famous tea of Yuanan country in Hubei province, is of yellow tea.
sentences.chinese: 鹿苑茶爲湖北省遠安縣歷史名茶，屬黃茶類。

sentences.english: At last, the article chooses Hubei Province northwestern region's Yuan An County to be instance analysis.
sentences.chinese: 最後本文選取了鄂西北地區的遠安縣進行了實證分析。
